Pemerintah Sudah Kantongi Nama Calon Dirut Bank Mandiri
06 Nov 2019, 07:49 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir. (CNN Indonesia/Adhi Wicaksono).

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pemerintah sudah memutuskan nama calon direktur utama PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk. Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir mengungkapkan nama dirut Bank Mandiri yang baru akan diumumkan pada Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham (RUPS) 8 Desember 2019."Dirut Mandiri sudah diputuskan. Kita tunggu saja pada RUPS 8 Desember nanti," ujarnya, Selasa (5/11).Penunjukkan dirut Bank Mandiri yang baru untuk menggantikan posisi yang ditinggalkan Kartika Wirjoatmodjo. Presiden Joko Widodo menunjuk Tiko sebagai Wakil Menteri BUMN.Tiko menjabat Dirut Bank Mandiri sejak 2015 menggantikan Dirut sebelumnya, yakni Budi Gunadi Sadikin yang juga diangkat menjadi Wakil Menteri BUMN.Selain dirut Bank Mandiri, pemerintah segera menyiapkan Direktur Utama PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium (Persero). Erick mengungkap hingga akhir bulan ini masih akan menempati posisi tersebut."Akhir bulan masih dalam proses review. Tapi dirutnya sudah ada," jawab Erick.Ia mengharapkan pengganti dirut Inalum pengganti Budi Gunadi Sadikin memiliki latar belakang keuangan yang kuat. Pasalnya, perseroan akan membawahi banyak anak usaha.Selain keuangan, dirut baru Inalum diharapkan memiliki latar belakang pertambangan."Apalagi kan pembagian dalam anak perusahaan cukup berbeda. Ada Antam, ada batu bara, ada lain-lain," paparnya.Budi Gunadi memulai karirnya di perusahaan pekat merah pada 2006 saat ia bergabung ke PT Bank Mandiri Tbk sebagai Direktur Micro & Retail Banking. Karirnya terus menanjak hingga diangkat menjadi Direktur Utama PT Bank Mandiri Tbk. Ia menduduki posisi tersebut hingga 2016 sebelum akhirnya ia diangkat sebagai Staff Khusus Menteri Negara BUMN dan aktif menjadi Anggota Dewan Penasehat Asosiasi Fintech Indonesia.Pada 2017, ia diangkat menjadi Komisaris Utama PT Inalum (Persero) sebelum akhirnya efektif menjadi direktur utama pada 14 September 2017.Di bawah kepemimpinannya, Inalum resmi menggenggam 51,23 persen saham PT Freeport Indonesia dengan membayarkan US$3,85 miliar. The Government Has Got the Name of a Candidate for Managing Director of Bank Mandiri
Nov 6 2019, 07:49 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


SOE Minister Erick Thohir. (CNN Indonesia / Adhi Wicaksono).

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The government has decided on the name of the prospective president director of PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk. SOE Minister Erick Thohir revealed the name of the new Bank Mandiri president director to be announced at the General Meeting of Shareholders (GMS) on December 8, 2019. "The Mandiri CEO was decided. We will wait for the GMS on December 8," he said, Tuesday (5/11). The appointment of a new Bank Mandiri president director to replace the position left by Kartika Wirjoatmodjo. President Joko Widodo appoints Tiko as Deputy Minister of BUMN. Tiko has been serving as the President Director of Bank Mandiri since 2015 replacing the previous Managing Director, Budi Gunadi Sadikin, who was also appointed Deputy Minister of BUMN. . Erick revealed that until the end of this month he would still occupy that position. "The end of the month is still in the process of review. But the president is already there," answered Erick. He expects a replacement for Inalum's CEO Budi Gunadi Sadikin to have a strong financial background. This is because the company will oversee many subsidiaries. In addition to finance, the new president director of Inalum is expected to have a mining background. "Moreover, the division within the subsidiary is quite different. There is Antam, there is coal, there are others," he explained. Budi Gunadi began his career in a concentrated red company in 2006 when he joined PT Bank Mandiri Tbk as Director of Micro & Retail Banking. His career continued to rise until he was appointed President Director of PT Bank Mandiri Tbk. He held this position until 2016 before finally he was appointed as Special Staff to the Minister of State Enterprises and was active as a Member of the Advisory Board of the Indonesian Fintech Association. In 2017, he was appointed President Commissioner of PT Inalum (Persero) before finally becoming effective managing director on 14 September 2017. Under his leadership, Inalum officially holds 51.23 percent of PT Freeport Indonesia's shares by paying US $ 3.85 billion. (age)
